Grouped_Utterances: Hey! I’ve been okay. I actually tried the muscle relaxation technique before bed, and it helped a bit. I did! I wrote a bit about my audition and how it made me feel. It was kind of cathartic. I realized I’m really hard on myself. I put so much pressure to succeed, and it’s exhausting. I don’t know. I guess I’d probably enjoy music more instead of stressing about it. I haven’t, but maybe I should. I just don’t want to worry them.
I’ve been thinking about my family a lot lately. I feel kind of distant from them. I don’t know. I think it’s just the pressure of everything, and I don’t want to burden them with my problems.
I felt really relaxed, and I actually fell asleep faster than usual.
Maybe I could just sing for fun, without worrying about how I sound? I could try it this weekend.  Yeah, I could do that.  I think I can manage that.
